jobs.title: UX UI Designer
jobs.details: A UI, UX, and front-end web developer is responsible for applying interactive and visual design principles on websites and web applications for a positive and cohesive user experience

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.details: A backend developer is one who makes use of the technology required to develop the products for the backend of any website

jobs.title: Front End Developer
jobs.details: Image result for front end developer A front end developer has one general responsibility: to ensure that website visitors can easily interact with the page. They do this through the combination of design, technology and programming to code a website's appearance, as well as taking care of debugging
